reviews: reading lot reviews regarding network issues m31 m21 bit skeptical buy m21. using huawei honor phones excellent call quality network reception. using honor 6x honor play thinking buying honor 9x pro found support google play opted out. began researching brands came across galaxy m21. features promising negative reviews regarding network held back. chance happened come across video youtube regarding lte 3g 2g settings m21. bingo! knew problem was. without waiting longer ordered smartphone.after receiving using days glad decision correct. fact call quality network reception m21is much better honor phones using long time.the reason network issue arises inserting sim starting m21 os phone selects lte/3g/2g (auto connect) option mobile networks default. using jio sim jio 4g. chance 4g signal becomes little weak phone search 3g 2g signal call network signal may drop get cut altogether since jio 4g. select lte option phone latch 4g signal even becomes little weak.so jio sim network issues suggest (1) select lte option mobile networks (2) access point names open 3 vertical dots reset default immediately reboot restart phone. hope helps.
